      • getADSLSingleEpoch

        public java.util.ArrayList<ADSLEpoch> getADSLSingleEpoch(java.lang.String adsRegExp)
        get a single epoch from each station matching A.D.S regexp
        Parameters:
        adsRegExp - Get a list of one epoch for each A.D.S in regexp
        Returns:

      • getADSEpochByDelaz

        public java.util.ArrayList<ADSLEpoch> getADSEpochByDelaz(java.lang.String adsRegExp,
                                                         double mindeg,
                                                         double within,
                                                         double lat,
                                                         double lng)
        retun a list of a single epoch from each station matching a A.D.S regexp and within a certain distance of the given latitude and longitude
        Parameters:
        adsRegExp - An A.D.S regexp to match
        mindeg - The minimum distance
        within - The distance in degrees from lat and long to include
        lat - Latitude in degrees (+/- 90)
        lng - Longitude in degrees (+/- 180)
        Returns:
        Array list with a single Epoch at each matching station

      • getADSLAliasStationID

        public java.util.ArrayList<ADSLEpoch> getADSLAliasStationID(ADSLEpoch matchEpoch)
        return a list of ADSLEpochs which match the stationID in the given epoch. Note : exclusion by dates must be done by caller
        Parameters:
        matchEpoch - An ADSL Epoch to match the station ID for
        Returns:
        A list of such

        Parameters:
        stationID - The station ID to match
        Returns:
        The list of matching epochs

      • getEpochFDSN

        public ADSLEpoch getEpochFDSN(java.lang.String net,
                              java.lang.String station,
                              java.util.GregorianCalendar g)
        return the best epoch for an FDSN networ.station. This is defined as the lowest location code lexicographically which is normally the blank location code if it exists, or the lowest one that does exist in the epoch.
        Parameters:
        net - The FDSN 2 character network code
        station - Station code (5 characters max)
        g - Epochal date desired
        Returns:
        The epoch matching or null of the A.D.S.L does not exist or no epoch exists for the date

      • getEpochFDSN

        public ADSLEpoch getEpochFDSN(java.lang.String net,
                              java.lang.String station,
                              java.lang.String location,
                              java.util.GregorianCalendar g)
        return the best epoch for an FDSN network.station.location.
        Parameters:
        net - The FDSN 2 character network code
        station - Station code (5 characters max)
        location - The location code (2 characters max)
        g - Epochal date desired
        Returns:
        The epoch matching or null of the A.D.S.L does not exist or no epoch exists for the date

      • getEpochFDSN

        public ADSLEpoch getEpochFDSN(java.lang.String net,
                              java.lang.String station,
                              long g)
        return the best epoch for an FDSN network.station. THis returns the lowest location code lexicographically which is normally the blank one, but might be some other if the blank one does not exist.
        Parameters:
        net - The FDSN 2 character network code
        station - Station code (5 characters max)
        g - Epochal date desired
        Returns:
        The epoch matching or null of the A.D.S.L does not exist or no epoch exists for the date

        return the best epoch for an FDSN network.station.location. T

        station - Station code (5 characters max)
        location - The location code (2 characters max)
